attributes.action: End Social Housing tenancies of people who own property in the UK or Abroad
attributes.additional_details: A huge proportion of social housing tenants, Council, Housing Associations etc.. are stuffed with tenants who own property or properties both in the UK and Abroad. Vast numbers of British despite their low incomes or needs have zero right to Housing assistance. For example:Person from Abroad gets housed. British born person zero housing! British person has no ownership of anything. Foreign national has 2 homes owned abroad! If you can afford to own property. what are you doing in Social housing?
attributes.background: End Social Housing tenancies of people who own property in UK and/or Abroad. If you can afford to own a property that is not social housing.Then you can afford to live in the property you own thus making more housing available to those in need and more British nationals can be housed.
